name: Zolde
description: Village leader of Polewater, a stilt-village over brackish wetlands. Zolde is fierce, practical, and deeply protective of her people.
distinguishingFeature: Iridescent scale patterns on her forearms
flavorWant: Dreams of traveling beyond Obojima

name: Paloma Clintock
description: AHA ranger stationed at Polewater. Paloma patrols the wetlands and tracks corruption spread from the south.
distinguishingFeature: Carries a weathered crossbow named 'Whisper'
flavorWant: Seeks a rare ingredient for a special recipe

name: Hakumon
description: Jovial ramen chef who runs the only hot-food stall in Polewater. Secretly an oni in human guise, drawn by the village's spiritual energy.
distinguishingFeature: Steam perpetually rising from his hands
flavorWant: Craves a specific rare tea

name: Tanisu
description: Pole fisherman who knows every channel in the wetlands
distinguishingFeature: Fingers stained blue from dye-fish
flavorWant: Wants to protect someone dear to them

name: Koru
description: Young guide who leads travelers through the safe paths of the bog
distinguishingFeature: Always barefoot, even on sharp reeds
flavorWant: Wants to protect someone dear to them

name: Weshi
description: Elderly basket-weaver who makes waterproof containers from swamp reeds
distinguishingFeature: Missing her left ear from a gator attack
flavorWant: Hopes to master a new craft

name: Doba
description: Herb gatherer who collects medicinal plants from deep in the marsh
distinguishingFeature: Crown of woven water lilies
flavorWant: Dreams of traveling beyond Obojima

name: Nalli
description: Dock hand who manages the small flotilla of punts and coracles
distinguishingFeature: Massive arms from years of poling boats
flavorWant: Hopes to prove their worth to a mentor

name: Reen
description: Quiet trapper who sets snares for marsh hares and monitors wildlife
distinguishingFeature: A live frog always sitting on her shoulder
flavorWant: Desires recognition from the community

name: Broad Naldo
description: Massive farmer who tends Okiri's terraced rice paddies. His booming voice carries across the valley.
distinguishingFeature: Arms like tree trunks, always carrying a hoe
flavorWant: Seeks the perfect mushroom specimen

name: Miss Lindley
description: Eccentric artisan and hedge witch who crafts talismans from mountain flowers. Knows more than she lets on about the old magic.
distinguishingFeature: Fingers permanently stained purple from herb work
flavorWant: Dreams of opening their own shop

name: Wenneth
description: Sword champion of Okiri who won the annual blade tournament three years running. Trains anyone willing to learn.
distinguishingFeature: A thin scar running from temple to jaw
flavorWant: Wants to find a lost family heirloom

name: Morna
description: A child who plays among the fields but listens to everything. Reports to Zolde in Polewater via messenger birds.
distinguishingFeature: Oversized hat that hides her face
flavorWant: Seeks a rare ingredient for a special recipe

name: Thim Torrelli
description: Gentle shepherd who grazes his flock on the high meadows above Okiri. Twin brother to Torrio.
distinguishingFeature: Plays a wooden flute beautifully
flavorWant: Desires recognition from the community

name: Torrio Torrelli
description: Shepherd and twin to Thim. More hot-headed than his brother, fiercely protective of the village flocks.
distinguishingFeature: Identical to Thim except for a broken nose
flavorWant: Seeks spiritual enlightenment

name: Rokoko
description: A jewel beetle spirit who runs Matango's finest kitchen. Rokoko's dishes use rare fungi and are legendary across Obojima.
distinguishingFeature: Carapace that shimmers between emerald and copper
flavorWant: Wants to protect someone dear to them

name: Madame Porcini
description: Proprietor of the Spore & Slumber inn. Madame Porcini knows every rumor that passes through Matango's fungal groves.
distinguishingFeature: Mushroom-shaped hat that she never removes
flavorWant: Wants to learn ancient First Age secrets

name: Reheni
description: Self-proclaimed 'Truffle Prince' of Matango. Reheni has an uncanny nose for the rarest underground fungi.
distinguishingFeature: Always dusted in spores
flavorWant: Wants to befriend a spirit

name: Chogo
description: Leader of a small gang that controls the black-market mushroom trade. Charming but ruthless when crossed.
distinguishingFeature: Gold-capped tooth shaped like a mushroom
flavorWant: Seeks a rare ingredient for a special recipe

name: Marvolio Chanterelle
description: Flamboyant fashionista who designs clothing from bioluminescent fungal fibers. His creations glow in the dark.
distinguishingFeature: Clothes that softly glow in shifting colors
flavorWant: Hopes to prove their worth to a mentor

name: Mama Amala
description: Retired monk who settled in Matango to study the spiritual properties of the great mycelium network.
distinguishingFeature: Prayer beads made of petrified fungal caps
flavorWant: Seeks spiritual enlightenment

name: Myron
description: Druid who tends the fungal groves and maintains the delicate balance between the mushroom colonies and the forest.
distinguishingFeature: Bark-like skin patches on his hands
flavorWant: Hopes to prove their worth to a mentor

name: Bree
description: Tiny merchant spirit who sells curios and oddities from a stall made of giant shelf fungi.
distinguishingFeature: Translucent wings that buzz when excited
flavorWant: Dreams of opening their own shop

name: Master of Ceremonies
description: The enigmatic host of Uluwa's floating spirit market. Nobody knows his true name. He orchestrates the nightly gatherings with theatrical flair.
distinguishingFeature: A mask that changes expression on its own
flavorWant: Wants to protect someone dear to them

name: Humble Utzu
description: Supposedly humble spirit who runs a 'legitimate' trading post. Actually the island's most prolific smuggler of First Age artifacts.
distinguishingFeature: Eyes that glow faintly in the dark
flavorWant: Wants to settle an old score

name: Emille
description: Wandering busker who plays haunting melodies on a bone flute. His music can calm spirits and agitate the living.
distinguishingFeature: Antlers adorned with tiny bells
flavorWant: Seeks the perfect mushroom specimen

name: Throth
description: Self-appointed constable of Uluwa who keeps order among the spirits. Stern but fair, and secretly lonely.
distinguishingFeature: A badge made from a polished river stone
flavorWant: Craves a specific rare tea

name: Orble the Fisher
description: Ancient spirit fishmonger who catches spirit fish with his bare hands from the luminescent pools beneath Uluwa.
distinguishingFeature: Hands that shimmer like fish scales
flavorWant: Seeks a rare ingredient for a special recipe

name: Dapo
description: Master of fermented fish paste, a delicacy among spirits. His recipes are generations old and fiercely guarded.
distinguishingFeature: Perpetual smell of fermented fish that spirits find intoxicating
flavorWant: Wants revenge on someone who wronged them

name: Master Hu
description: Legendary baker whose Happy Joy Cakes are famous across Obojima. His bakery is a Yatamon landmark.
distinguishingFeature: Flour permanently dusted in his eyebrows
flavorWant: Dreams of opening their own shop

name: Cholly
description: Conductor of Yatamon's rickety trolley system. Cholly knows every street and shortcut in the city.
distinguishingFeature: A conductor's cap that floats slightly above his head
flavorWant: Wants to build something lasting

name: Himitsu
description: Keeper of the Whispering Lantern tavern, where secrets are the preferred currency. Himitsu collects rumors like others collect coins.
distinguishingFeature: Lantern eyes that dim when they're listening intently
flavorWant: Craves a specific rare tea

name: Jenni
description: Cheerful shopkeeper who runs the general store. Jenni stocks everything from rope to rare tea blends.
distinguishingFeature: Apron with impossibly many pockets
flavorWant: Hopes to master a new craft

name: PM Escalante
description: Yatamon's meticulous postmaster who oversees the Courier Brigade's city operations. Nothing enters or leaves without her knowledge.
distinguishingFeature: Ink-stained fingers and reading spectacles
flavorWant: Seeks spiritual enlightenment

name: Gomber
description: Private detective who works the back alleys of Yatamon. Gruff, cynical, but has a soft spot for lost causes.
distinguishingFeature: A battered fedora and a magnifying glass on a chain
flavorWant: Wants to build something lasting

name: Granny Yuzu
description: Eccentric collector of First Age artifacts. Her cramped shop is a treasure trove of ancient oddities.
distinguishingFeature: Spectacles with multiple rotating lenses
flavorWant: Dreams of traveling beyond Obojima

name: Tatsu
description: Leader of the Jade Fang gang. Controls the dockside district through intimidation and a network of informants.
distinguishingFeature: Jade-green tattoo of a serpent coiling up his neck
flavorWant: Desires recognition from the community

name: Mikiko
description: Young apprentice witch studying under an absent master. Eager but prone to magical mishaps.
distinguishingFeature: Hair that changes color with her mood
flavorWant: Seeks a cure for an ailment

name: Dr. Zalia Frond
description: Brilliant scholar researching the Corruption's origin. She believes it's connected to First Age technology buried beneath the island.
distinguishingFeature: Always carries a leather journal filled with diagrams
flavorWant: Dreams of traveling beyond Obojima

name: Krocius
description: Historian and linguist who can read First Age inscriptions. Quiet and methodical, he works closely with Dr. Frond.
distinguishingFeature: Spectacles with one cracked lens he refuses to replace
flavorWant: Hopes to reunite with a lost companion

name: Lula
description: Proprietor of the Moonpetal Lounge, a rival tavern to the Whispering Lantern. Lula serves drinks that induce visions.
distinguishingFeature: Petals that fall from her hair and dissolve before hitting the ground
flavorWant: Hopes to reunite with a lost companion

name: Imelda
description: Elegant thief who specializes in liberating art from undeserving owners. Maintains a refined public persona.
distinguishingFeature: Elven ears half-hidden by an elaborate hairstyle
flavorWant: Wants to befriend a spirit

name: Mr. Basingstoke
description: Respectable-seeming warlock who runs an antiquities shop as a front. His patron is unknown but clearly powerful.
distinguishingFeature: One eye that is solid black
flavorWant: Craves a specific rare tea

name: Mortimus Fids
description: Curator of the Yatamon Museum of Natural Curiosities. Obsessed with cataloging every species on Obojima.
distinguishingFeature: Monocle and a butterfly net he always carries
flavorWant: Wants to find a lost family heirloom

name: Bokka Bokka
description: Enthusiastic spirit street performer who juggles balls of light. Knows everyone in the market district.
distinguishingFeature: Luminous orbs orbiting his head
flavorWant: Wants to settle an old score

name: Gojo
description: Rival ramen chef to Hakumon in Polewater. Gojo's noodle cart in Yatamon draws huge crowds.
distinguishingFeature: Headband soaked in broth
flavorWant: Hopes to prove their worth to a mentor

name: Kenta
description: Beachcomber who scours the Yatamon waterfront for washed-up treasures and First Age debris.
distinguishingFeature: Sun-bleached hair and sand-scarred hands
flavorWant: Dreams of traveling beyond Obojima

name: Suki
description: Courier Brigade rider who specializes in dangerous routes. Fearless on her modified bicycle.
distinguishingFeature: Goggles permanently pushed up on her forehead
flavorWant: Seeks a cure for an ailment

name: Old Matsuda
description: Retired fisherman turned storyteller. Holds court at the harbor telling tales of sea spirits.
distinguishingFeature: Missing two fingers on his left hand
flavorWant: Desires recognition from the community

name: Pebble
description: Tiny stone spirit who works as a messenger between the spirit and human communities.
distinguishingFeature: Body made of smooth river stones
flavorWant: Hopes to prove their worth to a mentor

name: Haruto
description: Dockworker and amateur boxer. Dreams of opening a fighting gym.
distinguishingFeature: Cauliflower ears and a broad grin
flavorWant: Desires to uncover a buried truth

name: Yumi
description: Seamstress who makes the traditional festival kimonos. Her work is in high demand.
distinguishingFeature: Thimbles on every finger
flavorWant: Wants to befriend a spirit

name: Ren
description: Night watchman who patrols the old quarter. Has seen things he won't talk about.
distinguishingFeature: A lantern that never goes out
flavorWant: Hopes to reunite with a lost companion

name: Chizuru
description: Tea house owner who serves as an informal mediator for disputes in the merchant quarter.
distinguishingFeature: Elaborate silver hair pins
flavorWant: Seeks the perfect mushroom specimen

name: Fumio
description: Street sweeper who knows every alley and secret passage in Yatamon.
distinguishingFeature: A broom taller than he is
flavorWant: Seeks spiritual enlightenment

name: Riko
description: Paper lantern spirit who lights up the evening markets. Shy but helpful.
distinguishingFeature: Body that glows warmly from within
flavorWant: Desires recognition from the community

name: Jinbei
description: Harbor master who manages ship traffic and collects docking fees. Gruff but honest.
distinguishingFeature: Enormous salt-and-pepper mustache
flavorWant: Wants to find a lost family heirloom

name: Duro
description: Master blacksmith of Toggle. Duro forges weapons and tools from rare alloys found in the mountain mines.
distinguishingFeature: Arms covered in burn scars he wears proudly
flavorWant: Wants to protect someone dear to them

name: Garo
description: Duro's apprentice and younger brother. Specializes in delicate metalwork and mechanical components.
distinguishingFeature: Always wearing thick leather gloves
flavorWant: Desires to uncover a buried truth

name: Holly Clintock
description: Brilliant engineer who designs and maintains Toggle's wind-powered machinery. Sister to Paloma in Polewater.
distinguishingFeature: Grease smudge permanently on her left cheek
flavorWant: Desires recognition from the community

name: Captain Clintock
description: Retired sea captain and patriarch of the Clintock family. Now serves as Toggle's informal leader and mediator.
distinguishingFeature: Pegleg carved from ironwood
flavorWant: Wants to protect someone dear to them

name: Marcel
description: Lighthouse keeper at Toggle Point. Marcel maintains the beacon that guides ships through the rocky approach.
distinguishingFeature: One eye perpetually squinting from years of watching the light
flavorWant: Dreams of traveling beyond Obojima

name: Shinobu
description: Mountain herbalist who gathers medicinal plants from the high slopes above Toggle.
distinguishingFeature: A basket that seems bottomless
flavorWant: Seeks a cure for an ailment

name: Gravel
description: Rock spirit who works the mines. Knows every vein and fault line in the mountain.
distinguishingFeature: Body of living granite
flavorWant: Craves a specific rare tea

name: Pip
description: Young runner who carries messages between Toggle and the lowland settlements.
distinguishingFeature: Perpetually out of breath
flavorWant: Wants to settle an old score

name: Esma
description: Cook who runs Toggle's communal kitchen. Her mountain stew is the town's pride.
distinguishingFeature: A ladle she wields like a weapon
flavorWant: Hopes to reunite with a lost companion

name: Thorn
description: Reclusive prospector who trades rare minerals for supplies. Distrustful of outsiders.
distinguishingFeature: Crystals growing from his shoulders
flavorWant: Wants revenge on someone who wronged them

name: Windy
description: Air spirit who helps power the windmills. Mischievous and unpredictable.
distinguishingFeature: Hair of streaming wind that never settles
flavorWant: Hopes to reunite with a lost companion

name: Vorian
description: Elven sand sculptor who creates breathtaking temporary art on Tidewater's beaches. His works vanish with each tide.
distinguishingFeature: Sand permanently embedded in the lines of his palms
flavorWant: Hopes to reunite with a lost companion

name: Ulmat
description: Omenspeaker who reads the future in tide pools and wave patterns. Tidewater's spiritual guide.
distinguishingFeature: Antlers wrapped in dried kelp
flavorWant: Seeks spiritual enlightenment

name: Gritty Groff
description: The 'Sand Witch' of Tidewater. Makes sandwiches and sand-based potions with equal enthusiasm.
distinguishingFeature: Gritty laugh and sand in her teeth
flavorWant: Craves a specific rare tea

name: Great Ferek
description: Massive sculptor who works in coral and driftwood. Competitive rival to Vorian's sand art.
distinguishingFeature: Hands the size of dinner plates
flavorWant: Desires recognition from the community

name: Kersh
description: Child warlock beachcomber who found a patron in a tide pool creature. Collects strange shells that whisper.
distinguishingFeature: Pockets always full of whispering shells
flavorWant: Wants to befriend a spirit

name: Marisol
description: Net mender who also repairs sails and rigging. Strong and quiet.
distinguishingFeature: Fingers calloused into permanent curves
flavorWant: Wants revenge on someone who wronged them

name: Cove
description: Tide spirit who warns fishers of dangerous currents. Appears as a shimmering figure in the surf.
distinguishingFeature: Body of swirling saltwater
flavorWant: Hopes to prove their worth to a mentor

name: Tomoko
description: Diver who harvests pearls and abalone from the reef. Best free-diver in Tidewater.
distinguishingFeature: Lungs like bellows, can hold breath for minutes
flavorWant: Wants to protect someone dear to them

name: Reef
description: Fisherman who claims to speak with the fish. Nobody is sure if he's serious.
distinguishingFeature: Scale-like birthmarks on his neck
flavorWant: Wants revenge on someone who wronged them

name: Sunny
description: Cheerful bait seller and gossip who sets up shop at dawn every day.
distinguishingFeature: Sunburn that never fades
flavorWant: Wants to settle an old score

name: Anchor
description: Retired sailor who runs a beachside shack selling grilled fish and stories.
distinguishingFeature: A real anchor tattooed on his chest
flavorWant: Seeks a cure for an ailment

name: Little Yoshi
description: Boat builder's apprentice who dreams of sailing to the mainland.
distinguishingFeature: Sawdust permanently in his hair
flavorWant: Craves a specific rare tea

name: Coral
description: Reef spirit who tends the living coral gardens offshore. Concerned about the Corruption reaching the reef.
distinguishingFeature: Body of branching pink coral
flavorWant: Hopes to prove their worth to a mentor

name: Adira
description: Head healer of Hogstone Hot Springs. Adira's poultices and thermal treatments can mend wounds both physical and spiritual.
distinguishingFeature: Warm hands that glow faintly when healing
flavorWant: Wants to protect someone dear to them

name: Chisuay
description: Tea master who brews with spring water and rare mountain herbs. Secretly an oni who genuinely loves tea more than mischief.
distinguishingFeature: Steam curls from his nostrils when he laughs
flavorWant: Wants to build something lasting

name: Migo
description: Chisuay's cheerful assistant who tends the tea garden. A small hot-spring spirit who loves chatting with visitors.
distinguishingFeature: Body perpetually steaming like a hot kettle
flavorWant: Wants to find a lost family heirloom

name: Indigo
description: A fossa-shaped spirit who serves as majordomo of the hot springs resort. Impeccably organized and slightly haughty.
distinguishingFeature: Sleek dark fur and an impossibly long tail
flavorWant: Wants to protect someone dear to them

name: Yuki
description: Masseuse whose treatments are said to cure everything from broken hearts to cursed limbs.
distinguishingFeature: Hands that crack like thunder
flavorWant: Wants to find a lost family heirloom

name: Banto
description: Groundskeeper who maintains the pools and channels. Knows the plumbing of the springs intimately.
distinguishingFeature: Perpetually damp clothing
flavorWant: Wants to build something lasting

name: Suzu
description: Bell spirit who announces guests and rings the hour. Her chimes carry across the valley.
distinguishingFeature: Body shaped like a bronze bell
flavorWant: Seeks a cure for an ailment

name: Hotaru
description: Night attendant who tends the lanterns and watches over guests during evening soaks.
distinguishingFeature: Eyes that reflect light like a cat's
flavorWant: Craves a specific rare tea

name: Kemushi
description: Gardener who cultivates the medicinal herb gardens surrounding the springs.
distinguishingFeature: Green-tinged skin from years among plants
flavorWant: Desires recognition from the community

name: Rindo
description: Cook who prepares the healing broths and therapeutic meals for guests.
distinguishingFeature: A nose that can identify any herb by smell alone
flavorWant: Seeks spiritual enlightenment

name: Okami
description: Wolf spirit who guards the mountain paths to Hogstone. Fiercely territorial but respects those who show proper courtesy.
distinguishingFeature: Silver-white fur that shimmers in moonlight
flavorWant: Seeks the perfect mushroom specimen

name: Voraro the Parasite
description: A warlock who has bonded with a parasitic entity found deep in the Shoom. Voraro lurks in the dungeon, drawing power from the corruption.
distinguishingFeature: Black veins visible beneath translucent skin
flavorWant: Wants to build something lasting

name: Lionfish King
description: Ruler of the Coral Throne in the undersea dungeon. A massive lionfish spirit who commands the fish folk armies.
distinguishingFeature: Crown of living venomous spines
flavorWant: Seeks spiritual enlightenment

name: Ranger Kesso
description: AHA ranger who went missing during a patrol near the Shoom. Captured and held in the depths.
distinguishingFeature: Torn AHA uniform with ranger insignia
flavorWant: Desires peace and quiet above all else

name: Courier Fane
description: Courier Brigade rider who disappeared while carrying a message through the Gale Fields.
distinguishingFeature: Courier satchel with undelivered letters
flavorWant: Seeks a cure for an ailment

name: Traveling Sora
description: Wandering merchant who trades between settlements, carrying rare goods and rarer news.
distinguishingFeature: A cart pulled by a trained boar
flavorWant: Wants to settle an old score

name: Ranger Aoki
description: AHA ranger who patrols the northern routes. Reports to the AHA leadership in Yatamon.
distinguishingFeature: A bow made of pale driftwood
flavorWant: Hopes to master a new craft

name: Courier Miku
description: Courier Brigade rider who handles the mountain routes between Toggle and Hogstone.
distinguishingFeature: Bicycle with oversized wheels for mountain terrain
flavorWant: Craves a specific rare tea

name: Wandering Gust
description: A wind spirit who drifts between settlements carrying whispered messages from the spirit world.
distinguishingFeature: Translucent body that ripples like a heat mirage
flavorWant: Hopes to master a new craft
